title: Branding study for Monotype Imaging
content:
Hi Typophiles,

I’d like to ask on behalf of Monotype Imaging that you please follow the links below, where we are offering four short surveys on our various brands.

We’ll use the resulting information to improve and enhance the brands and the sites that represent them. All the surveys are anonymous, and we would especially appreciate feedback from the font-conscious folks at Typophile.

If you have other comments not addressed in the surveys, please contact me offline, rather than post them here in this thread.

[fonts.com survey](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417181613/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx%3Fsm%3DfCCZUpPq2kJ47hXx6eCccg_3d_3d)

[ITC survey](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417181613/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx%3Fsm%3DfBX5QgtH8sVHZa_2bhemQllQ_3d_3d)

[Monotype survey](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417181613/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx%3Fsm%3D6NbXA3oSjbE5yZZzRqzsjw_3d_3d)

[Linotype Survey](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417181613/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx%3Fsm%3DNTTs3gXA2Y_2fITxO3BC4MfQ_3d_3d)
author: crossgrove
